<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/tenants/{tenant_id}/voucher-definitions/{id}/vouchers/{voucher_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Soft deletes a specific voucher

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
